properties.text:
MUSE MUSIC GENERATOR (EXPERIMENTAL)

This is an experimental node package for AI music generation.
Report issues: github.com/Greg-Aster/ComfyUI_Muse

First run auto-downloads models (~10GB total).
Requires 12-16GB VRAM. Models swap automatically.

LYRICS FORMAT:
[Verse]
Your lyrics here

[Chorus]
Catchy hook here

STYLE EXAMPLES:
- "Pop, upbeat, female vocals, synth, 120 BPM"
- "Rock ballad, emotional, electric guitar, drums"
- "Lo-fi hip hop, chill, jazzy piano"
- "EDM, energetic, bass heavy, festival"

For instrumental: enable 'instrumental' toggle

groups.title: Muse Music Generator - Enter lyrics and style, then Queue Prompt
